name: The Bull and Mouse
description:
This is a visual novel made in a little less than a week for  Neophyte Studios' 5th Narrative Game Jam.

 This short romance story follows a minotaur named Tory. She's a female womanizer with an edge whose favorite pastime is picking up girls. If she isn't chatting them up in a bar she's playing them a song somewhere private with her guitar. But today she'll be forced to use new methods to charm someone...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The optional theme was Multimodality which inspired the circumstance Tory is put in that totally throws off her game and other aspects of the story.

This shouldn't take any longer than half an hour. I didn't have that much time to create it. My goal was to just make something short, kinda funny, and hopefully at least a little interesting. I also wanted it to have a satisfying enough ending but also be something that can be expanded upon later since I think that's what the hosts want. If I was to continue this I'd make Tory a more redeemable character.

Credits:

Sound Effects from Zapsplat: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Music by Eric Matyas: https://soundimage.org/

Click the audio icon if you want to toggle the music off/on
